name: Medieval 2: Total War
description:
Medieval 2: Total War is a strategy game developed by Creative Assembly. It was originally released in 2006. It was published by SEGA. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Medieval 2: Total War on PC.
It was directed by Robert T. Smith. James Vincent, Jeff van Dyck and Richard Vaughan scored the game.
